plays.text: Penalty to Matt Cooke 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Mike Rathje
Penalty to Todd Bertuzzi 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Vincent Damphousse assisted by Teemu Selanne and Jim Fahey
Penalty to Dan McGillis 2 minutes for Interference Markus Naslund
Penalty to Shawn Heins 2 minutes for Tripping Trevor Letowski
Penalty to Patrick Marleau 2 minutes for Tripping Daniel Sedin
Goal scored by Patrick Marleau assisted by Jim Fahey and Todd Harvey
Penalty to Henrik Sedin 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Todd Warriner 2 minutes for High Sticking Teemu Selanne
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Tripping Todd Bertuzzi
Goal scored by Niklas Sundstrom assisted by Dan McGillis and Teemu Selanne
